statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, transcript FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, transcript, sentiment_score FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, sentiment_score FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, transcript, sentiment_score FROM customer_feedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, transcript FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE transcript LIKE '%important%' OR transcript LIKE '%excellent%' ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_score FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(sentiment_score) > 0.3 ORDER BY average_score DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, COUNT(transcript) AS transcript_count FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY feedback_id HAVING transcript_count > 1 ORDER BY transcript_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, customer_id FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT analysis_result FROM feedback_analysis WHERE analysis_id = 3;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 123 AND feedback_text LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_text IS NOT NULL AND voice_transcript IS NULL;

SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text, analysis_result FROM customer_feedback LEFT JOIN feedback_analysis ON customer_feedback.feedback_id = feedback_analysis.feedback_id WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%complaint%' ORDER BY analysis_id ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, voice_transcript FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%resolved%' OR voice_transcript LIKE '%satisfied%' ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(analysis_id) AS average_analysis_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM feedback_analysis;
SELECT * FROM feedback_transcripts;
SELECT transcript, customer_id FROM feedback_transcripts WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT feedback_id, transcript FROM feedback_transcripts ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT MAX(sentiment_score) AS max_score, MIN(sentiment_score) AS min_score FROM customer_sentiments;
SELECT feedback_id, sentiment_category, analysis_result FROM customer_sentiments INNER JOIN analysis_results ON customer_sentiments.feedback_id = analysis_results.feedback_id;
SELECT * FROM feedback_transcripts WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT transcript FROM feedback_transcripts WHERE feedback_id = 5;
SELECT feedback_id, sentiment_score FROM customer_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT feedback_id, analysis_result->>'sentiment' AS sentiment FROM analysis_results WHERE feedback_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM feedback_transcripts ft JOIN customer_sentiments cs ON ft.feedback_id = cs.feedback_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT file_name, file_path FROM AudioFile ORDER BY file_size DESC;
SELECT speaker_name FROM Speaker WHERE speaker_gender = 'Male';
SELECT transcribed_text FROM Transcript ORDER BY transcript_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE transcript_id = 1001 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT c.feedback_id, t.transcribed_text, s.speaker_name FROM CustomerFeedback c INNER JOIN Transcript t ON c.transcript_id = t.transcript_id INNER JOIN Speaker s ON t.speaker_id = s.speaker_id;

SELECT c.feedback_id, af.file_name FROM CustomerFeedback c INNER JOIN Transcript t ON c.transcript_id = t.transcript_id INNER JOIN AudioFile af ON t.audio_file_id = af.audio_file_id WHERE af.file_size > 10000;

SELECT c.feedback_text, s.speaker_name FROM CustomerFeedback c INNER JOIN Transcript t ON c.transcript_id = t.transcript_id INNER JOIN Speaker s ON t.speaker_id = s.speaker_id WHERE s.speaker_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY c.feedback_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_id, transcript, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_score FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM VoiceTranscript WHERE transcript_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM CustomerDetails ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, phone_number FROM CustomerDetails WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT transcript FROM VoiceTranscript WHERE feedback_id = 54321 AND transcript_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedbacks FROM TranscriptAnalytics GROUP BY feedback_id HAVING total_feedbacks > 5 ORDER BY total_feedbacks DESC;
